Package org.eclipse.imagen.media.mosaic

Class RasterAccessorExt

Object
RasterAccessor
RasterAccessorExt
public class RasterAccessorExt extends RasterAccessor
Extends the RasterAcessor to handle more data type transformation cases
Author:
Andrea Aime - GeoSolutions

  • Method Details

    • findCompatibleTags

      public static RasterFormatTag[] findCompatibleTags(RenderedImage[] srcs, RenderedImage dst)
      Finds the appropriate tags for the constructor, based on the SampleModel and ColorModel of all the source and destination.
      Parameters:
      srcs - The operations sources; may be null which is taken to be equivalent to zero sources.
      dst - The operation destination.
      Returns:
      An array containing RasterFormatTags for the sources in the first src.length elements and a RasterFormatTag for the destination in the last element.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if dst is null.

    • expandNoData

      public static Range expandNoData(Range noData, RasterFormatTag rft, RenderedImage sourceImage, RenderedImage destImage)
